page.para: My name is Kar/thik. I am go/ing to bed.
My mum tells me a bed/time sto/ry eve/ry night.
One sto/ry is a/bout a talk/ing frog.
An/oth/er sto/ry is a/bout a lit/tle mouse.
The lit/tle mouse lives in a king’s beard. The king takes the mouse eve/ry/where.
There is al/so a sto/ry a/bout an el/e/phant called A/le/khya.
A/le/khya loves to fly! She trav/els far and wide.
My fa/vour/ite sto/ry is a/bout a tiger. He falls in/to a hole.
A clev/er fox res/cues the ti/ger. Then the fox and the ti/ger be/come friends.
Eve/ry night I lis/ten to mum’s sto/ry. And then I go to sleep.
